content: कुणप {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (पी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 3. 143</ls>] Smelling like a dead body, stinking. --पः, --पं A dead body, corpse; शासनीयः कुणपभोजनः <ls>V. 5.</ls> (a vulture); अमेध्यकुणपाशी च <ls>Ms. 12. 71</ls>; often used as a term of contempt with living beings. --पः {@--1@} A spear. {@--2@} A foul smell, stench.
